scripts.say: On the horizon – across the many islands scattered about the Mirror Sea – sits an isolated castle. Its structure wooden, its surroundings silent.
Its purpose, unclear. Perhaps to defend a strategic position, or symbolize its owner's control over the area.
Regardless, the Sirens have their destructive eyes fixated upon it.
And soon, it might fall to ruin by their hand.
I thought we'd be safe in your castle, but it seems I've been proven wrong...
Ay only come to this server to build things! Why must such wanton destruction befall my creations?!
The Sirens are behind this...
Sirens...? You mean the ones from that game Fubuki plays?
Are you saying that this is a video game world?!
We need to get out of here! Ayame, why would you make a castle this big without constructing a secret escape route?!
Twas designed with everyday activities in mind! 'Tis for raising animals, growing crops, and lounging around!
Ay never suspected a siege to happen, much less there be a need for a hidden passage!
Welp... We're screwed, then.
It's okay. I can take care of the Sirens.
Excuse me?! You two against an army?
Well said! Ay shall join them! These "Sirens" shall learn the sharpness of my blades!
It's too dangerous for you. You don't have any rigging.
Shion, Ayame, you're not trained to fight. Ayanami and I can do it.
B-but...
You don't need to worry. We're experienced with fighting them.
Dunno why, but they have a lot of carriers... That works in our favor.
Yes. If we can launch a surprise attack on them, it will be easy!
